model

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Robot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CostEstimationStrategy, PathFinding

    public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
implements Entity
    This class contains the implementation of the Robot methods.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Miraj Shah, Devin Shingadia, Jacob Williams, Mohammed Hamza Zaman, Vivek Bhukhan, Christos Dolopikos.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Robot

        public Robot()
        Robot Constructor. Creates a Robot object and sets both the boolean value for Order Status and the carrying boolean value to false automatically. Wait time is initialised to 0.

    • Method Detail

      • setStart

        public void setStart(int x,
                     int y)
        Sets the starting X and Y coordinate values which is then assigned to start as the starting Point coordinate for the Robot.
        Parameters:
        x - a int value. Used to set the X coordinate.
        y - a int value. Used to set the Y coordinate.

      • getBatteryLevel

        public int getBatteryLevel()
        The current battery level of the robot.
        Returns:
        int Returns the batteryLevel of a robot.

      • charging

        public void charging(int chargeRate)
        Charges the robots batteryLevel when the robot is on its Charging Pod node.
        Parameters:
        chargeRate - a int value. Representing the rate which the robot's batteryLevel is being charged.

      • decreaseBatteryLevel

        public void decreaseBatteryLevel()
        Decreases the value of the batteryLevel of a robot by 1 or 2, after every tick depending on if it's carrying an order or not.

      • updateBattery

        public void updateBattery(int batteryLevel)
        Updates the battery level of the robot and assigns it
        Parameters:
        batteryLevel - the batteryLevel. The updated value of the battery level for the robot.

      • setDestinationStart

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> setDestinationStart()
        Stores the Point coordinates in an ArrayList, for the robots Charging Pod where the robot initially started from.
        Returns:
        Returns a ArrayList of Point coordinates. Used by the robot to go back its start position.

      • setBatteryCap

        public void setBatteryCap(int batteryLevel)
        Sets the robots batteryLevel no higher than its original value.
        Parameters:
        batteryLevel - the batteryLevel. Original battery level assigned to battery level to prevent value being higher than the robots original value.

      • receiveOrder

        public void receiveOrder(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> destination)
        Contains an ArrayList of Point coordinates for each place the Robot has to visit in order to complete the order.
        Parameters:
        destination - the ArrayList of Point coordinates.

      • orderDecision

        public void orderDecision(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> destination)
        Decides whether a robot can take an order or not.
        Parameters:
        destination - a ArrayList of Point coordinates.

      • pickUpItems

        public void pickUpItems()
        Robots takes the items needed for the order it has from the storage shelf. The carrying boolean value set to true when Robot is carrying an shelf.

      • atLocation

        public boolean atLocation()
        Checks to see if the robot is at any location such as a Storage shelf, Packing Station or Charging Pod.
        Returns:
        Returns boolean values. True if robot coordinates equals nextDestination Point coordinate. Else returns false when it is not at its nextDestination.

      • waitAtPacking

        public boolean waitAtPacking()
        The method sets the wait time of the robot at a packing station.
        Returns:
        Returns boolean values. True if waitTime is greater than 0. Else returns false, when the robot doesn't need to wait at the packing station.

      • setWaitTime

        public void setWaitTime(int time)
        Sets the value of waitTime field for the robot depending on the order.
        Parameters:
        time - a int value. The time parameter assigned to waitTime, determining how long the waiting period for the robot is.

      • nextInPath

        public java.awt.Point nextInPath()
        When the robot reaches atLocation(), this method checks the length order ArrayList through each index, for another order.
        Returns:
        Returns nextDestination Point coordinate. The destination of the next place in the simulation the robot needs to go.

      • getDestination

        public java.awt.Point getDestination()
        This method gets the next destination for the robot to go, through calling the nextInPath() method.
        Returns:
        Returns the nextInPath() method so the robot knows where to go next in the simulation.

      • dropOrder

        public void dropOrder()
        The robot drops off items at a packing station. Then sets Returns a boolean value of carrying to false when the robot drops off the shelf.

        public boolean getOrderStatus()

      • pythagoras

        public double pythagoras(double x,
                         double y,
                         double X,
                         double Y)
        Calculates the distance between starting nodes and end nodes being (Packing stations, Charging pods, Storage shelfs).
        Parameters:
        x - a double value. Represents the x coordinate of the first node.
        y - a double value. Represents the y coordinate of the first node.
        X - a double value. Represents the X coordinate of the first node.
        Y - a double value. Represents the Y coordinate of the first node.
        Returns:
        Returns the distance between the start and end nodes.

      • getDestinations

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> getDestinations()
        Gets the Point coordinates of the Shelves, Packing Stations and Charging Pods.
        Returns:
        order a ArrayList. Contains the coordinates of the Shelves, Packing Stations and Charging Pods.

      • finishOrder

        public void finishOrder(int index)
        Checks the order ArrayList and sets orderStatus to false when the robot has finished the order.
        Parameters:
        index - a int value. Represents the position of the index value within the order ArrayList.

      • atPacking

        public boolean atPacking()
        Checks if the robot is at the Packing Station by iterating and comparing through the ArrayList containing the coordinates of the robot.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value of carrying to false when the robot drops off the storage shelf and atPacking() is set to true. Else returns false, when the robot isn't at the packing station.

      • atShelf

        public boolean atShelf()
        Checks if the robot is at the Storage by iterating and comparing through the ArrayList containing the coordinates of the robot.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value of carrying to true when the robot picks up the storage shelf and atShelf() is set to true. Else returns false, when the robot isn't at the storage shelf.

      • atChargePod

        public boolean atChargePod()
        Checks if the robot is its charging pod by iterating and comparing through the ArrayList containing the coordinates of the robot.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value of true when the robot coordinate is equal to its start coordinate. Else returns false, when the robot isn't at its Charging Pod.

      • completeOrder

        public boolean completeOrder()
        Gets the value of completed.
        Returns:
        Returns boolean value of completed.
